dict.string: The smoothest agent in the world saving it from an oversensitve maniac
Bad ass roman fucking up an entire arena of muthafuckas HE CANT BE STOPPED
Lets be Honest this is the jokers movie not batmans
A whole 2 hours and a half of ass-kicking greatness
THIS IS!!..a mediocre movie at best
This movie has one of the greatest action sequences i have ever seen you'll watch it over and over again and youll know what i am talking about once you get there

The prequels were pretty bad movies but that does not take away from its story..this is the conclucion to one of the best stories told in Human history....WIth a sickass fighting scene at the very end of the movie
Star Wars Episode III: Revenge of the Sith
The highly anticipated greatness is almost here and i cannot be more excited for i... This is going to be the hollywood event of the past Decade
Star Wars Episode 8: The Last Jedi

The lord of the rings.....enough said a warm movie stuffed with plenty of action and a great story of resistance and overcoming...Get your family together gather round and watch al 3 of the movies in the trilogy -- just be ready to stay up for a solid 16 hours
